The Brink.title: The Brink
The Brink.summary: An epic dark comedy focusing on a geopolitical crisis and its effect on three disparate and desperate men: U.S. Secretary of State Walter Larson; Alex Talbot, a lowly Foreign Service officer; and Zeke Tilson, an ace Navy fighter pilot. These three compromised souls must pull through the chaos around them to save the planet from World War III.

1.title: Pilot
1.summary: An unlikely trio try to prevent World War III: the U.S. secretary of state in Washington, D.C., a low-level diplomat in Islamabad, and a stressed-out Navy fighter pilot on an aircraft carrier in the Red Sea.

2.title: Half-Cocked
2.summary: Alex is captured by Zaman's soldiers and subjected to intense interrogation when they suspect he's working for the CIA. Walter begs the president to delay the air strikes until he can reach someone in the Pakistani government. Zeke and Glenn continue their high-stakes mission under extreme circumstances.

3.title: Baghdad My Ass
3.summary: Alex needs to get to the U.S. embassy to send a message to Walter. Zeke and Glenn land in the brig to await their disciplinary hearing. Walter's desperate flight to India could be in jeopardy due to a medical emergency.
3.path: /mnt/media/television/The Brink/Season 1/The Brink - s01e03 - Baghdad My Ass.mkv

4.title: I'll Never Be Batman
4.summary: Alex gets advice from Walter before his crucial rendezvous with Raja. Walter works around a medical emergency and interference from above to cut a deal with India's foreign minister. Zeke realizes he's promised more than he can deliver to the women in his life.
4.path: /mnt/media/television/The Brink/Season 1/The Brink - s01e04 - I'll Never Be Batman.mkv

5.title: Swim, Shmuley, Swim
5.summary: Zeke and Glenn are rescued by an eccentric English couple after escaping their armed captors. Alex and Rafiq find Fareeda hiding at her school with a group of female students who have nowhere to go. Walter defies the president by flying to Israel to meet with the prime minister.
5.path: /mnt/media/television/The Brink/Season 1/The Brink - s01e05 - Swim, Shmuley, Swim.mkv

6.title: Tweet Tweet Tweet
6.summary: Walter runs into Joanne in Tel Aviv and tries to use her new position to his advantage. Zeke and Glenn, who are being held hostage by Martin and Vanessa, agree to participate in role-playing games in hopes of being released. Kittredge shares a revolutionary dream with Alex.
6.path: /mnt/media/television/The Brink/Season 1/The Brink - s01e06 - Tweet Tweet Tweet.mkv

7.title: Sticky Wicket
7.summary: Alex plans an escape for some Pakistani schoolgirls. Zeke is challenged to a fight. Walter fakes a medical emergency.

8.title: Who's Grover Cleveland?
8.summary: Alex makes amends. Zeke is forced to face the women in his life. Walter urges caution in the Situation Room.
8.path: /mnt/media/television/The Brink/Season 1/The Brink - s01e08 - Who's Grover Cleveland?.mkv

9.title: Just a Little Crazy Talk
9.summary: Walter seeks to make a deal with Zaman's highest-ranking general. A grounded Zeke and Glenn find a way to pass the time. Rafiq's translation helps Alex determine how to go about implementing Walter's "Plan B".
9.path: /mnt/media/television/The Brink/Season 1/The Brink - s01e09 - Just a Little Crazy Talk.mkv

10.title: There Will Be Consequences
10.summary: There is a looming global crisis, which Walter tries to avert with other heads of state via videoconferencing. Zeke and Glenn end up in a compromised state. Alex attempts to make a personal connection with Zaman.
10.path: /mnt/media/television/The Brink/Season 1/The Brink - s01e10 - There Will Be Consequences.mkv
